> October 19, 2025

With the addition of Qwilfish, Generation 1 to 4 is now complete !

## What hides in the mist

Ghost gets its own Murky weather effect now. Lose all hope if you see the fog rolling in !

## UI updates

New Pok√©mon tooltips give you access to more information at a glance, including shield amount, passive stacks and item stat buffs. Evolutions in shop now indicate the synergies you gain or lose by evolving. Many other UI improvements have been made to make the game more informative and easier to play.
